statements: SELECT * FROM vehicle_sensors
SELECT sensor_location, timestamp FROM vehicle_sensors
SELECT * FROM vehicle_sensors WHERE diagnostic_code = 123
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_location FROM vehicle_sensors ORDER BY sensor_id DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM vehicle_sensors
SELECT * FROM vehicle_sensors WHERE sensor_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT sensor_location, diagnostic_code FROM vehicle_sensors WHERE diagnostic_code > 100 ORDER BY sensor_location ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM vehicle_sensors WHERE sensor_location LIKE '%front%'
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp FROM vehicle_sensors WHERE sensor_location = 'rear' AND diagnostic_code BETWEEN 200 AND 300
SELECT DISTINCT diagnostic_code FROM vehicle_sensors ORDER BY diagnostic_code
SELECT * FROM diagnostic_codes;
SELECT code_id, code_name FROM diagnostic_codes WHERE sensor_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT code_name, description FROM diagnostic_codes WHERE sensor_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY code_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_sensors WHERE vehicle_id = '1b9d6bcd-bbfd-4b2d-9b5d-ab8dfbbd4b24';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, location FROM vehicle_sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT code_id, code_name, sensor_id, description FROM diagnostic_codes WHERE sensor_id = 'c4272d03-71a2-4f9e-b3c4-608c1aeab96c';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, location, vehicle_id FROM vehicle_sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT * FROM diagnostic_codes ORDER BY code_name ASC;
SELECT code_id, code_name, description FROM diagnostic_codes WHERE code_id = 'c8c0a52a-0331-496b-bf10-6c6b6f49e5f6';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, location, vehicle_id FROM vehicle_sensors ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, sensor_type FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature';
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_location FROM sensors ORDER BY sensor_name DESC;
SELECT code_id, code, description FROM diagnostic_codes WHERE code_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT data_id, sensor_id, code_id, data_value, timestamp FROM vehicle_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_location FROM sensors ORDER BY sensor_name DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, sensor_location FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT DISTINCT sensor_type FROM sensors;
SELECT sensors.sensor_name, MAX(vehicle_data.data_value) AS max_value FROM sensors INNER JOIN vehicle_data ON sensors.sensor_id = vehicle_data.sensor_id GROUP BY sensors.sensor_name;
SELECT * FROM diagnostic_codes LIMIT 10;
SELECT code, description FROM diagnostic_codes WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT sensor_name, location, vehicle_id FROM sensors WHERE sensor_id = 2;
SELECT sensor_id, vehicle_id, code FROM sensor_readings WHERE reading_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model, year FROM vehicles ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT * FROM diagnostic_codes WHERE code_id = 1;
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM sensors WHERE vehicle_id = 1 ORDER BY sensor_name ASC;
SELECT code, description FROM diagnostic_codes WHERE sensor_id = 2 AND code = 'AAA';
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model, year FROM vehicles WHERE year > 2015 ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT reading_id, sensor_id, vehicle_id, code, reading_timestamp FROM sensor_readings WHERE reading_timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM diagnostic_codes;
SELECT code_id, code, description FROM diagnostic_codes ORDER BY code_id DESC;
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model, year_of_manufacture FROM vehicles WHERE year_of_manufacture > 2010;
SELECT * FROM sensor_readings WHERE reading_value > 50 ORDER BY reading_time DESC;
SELECT sensor_type, description FROM vehicle_sensors WHERE sensor_type LIKE 'Temperature%'
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model FROM vehicles WHERE year_of_manufacture > 2015;
SELECT v.vehicle_make, v.vehicle_model, s.sensor_type, s.description FROM vehicles v JOIN vehicle_sensors s ON v.vehicle_id = s.sensor_id;

SELECT v.vehicle_make, v.vehicle_model, sr.reading_value, sl.location_name FROM vehicles v JOIN sensor_readings sr ON v.vehicle_id = sr.sensor_id JOIN sensor_locations sl ON sr.sensor_id = sl.sensor_id;

SELECT v.vehicle_make, v.vehicle_model, sr.reading_value, sl.location_name FROM vehicles v JOIN sensor_readings sr ON v.vehicle_id = sr.sensor_id JOIN sensor_locations sl ON sr.sensor_id = sl.sensor_id WHERE sr.reading_time >= '2022-01-01';
